Province territory:..validate: newData.isString() && (newData.val() == 'AB' || newData.val() == 'BC' || newData.val() == 'MB' || newData.val() == 'NB' || newData.val() == 'NL' || newData.val() == 'NS' || newData.val() == 'NT' || newData.val() == 'NU' || newData.val() == 'ON' || newData.val() == 'PE' || newData.val() == 'QC' || newData.val() == 'SK' || newData.val() == 'YT' || newData.val() == '')
